title: Netlink Sol Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 0.01 crore, up 30.77% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Netlink Solutions are:Net Sales at Rs 0.01 crore in December 2025 up 30.77% from Rs. 0.01 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 0.49 crore in December 2025 up 164.44% from Rs. 0.76 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 0.11 crore in December 2025 up 113.58% from Rs. 0.81 crore in December 2024. Netlink Sol EPS has increased to Rs. 1.95 in December 2025 from Rs. 3.02 in December 2024. Netlink Sol shares closed at 188.35 on January 12, 2026 (BSE) and has given 11.29% returns over the last 6 months and 12.75% over the last 12 months.
